pkgmetadata.longdescription: Finds the Inflection Point of a Curve // Implementation of methods Extremum Surface Estimator (ESE) and Extremum Distance Estimator (EDE) to identify the inflection point of a curve . Christopoulos, DT (2014) arXiv:1206.5478v2 [math.NA] . Christopoulos, DT (2016) https://veltech.edu.in/wp- content/uploads/2016/04/Paper-04-2016.pdf . Christopoulos, DT (2016) doi:10.2139/ssrn.3043076 .
